testcase.purpose: This test validates the WebIDL included in the Raw Sockets specification
This test validates the UDPSocket exists
This test validates the TCPSocket exists
This test validates the TCPServerSocket exists
Check if readonly TCPServerSocket.localAddress exists and type of DOMString
Check if readonly TCPServerSocket.localPort exists and type of unsigned short
Check if readonly TCPServerSocket.readyState exists and type of enum
Check if TCPServerSocket.onconnect exists and type of event
Check if TCPServerSocket.onerror exists and type of event
Check if TCPServerSocket.close exists and type of function
Check if TCPServerSocket.suspend exists and type of function
Check if TCPServerSocket.resume exists and type of function
Check if readonly TCPSocket.remoteAddress exists and type of DOMString
Check if readonly TCPSocket.remotePort exists and type of DOMString
Check if readonly TCPSocket.localAddress exists and type of DOMString
Check if readonly TCPSocket.localPort exists and type of unsigned short
Check if readonly TCPSocket.bufferedAmount exists and type of unsigned long
Check if readonly TCPSocket.readyState exists and type of enum
Check if TCPSocket.ondrain exists and type of event
Check if TCPSocket.onopen exists and type of event
Check if TCPSocket.onclose exists and type of event
Check if TCPSocket.onhalfclose exists and type of event
Check if TCPSocket.onerror exists and type of event
Check if TCPSocket.onmessage exists and type of event
Check if TCPSocket.close exists and type of function
Check if TCPSocket.halfClose exists and type of function
Check if TCPSocket.suspend exists and type of function
Check if TCPSocket.resume exists and type of function
Check if TCPSocket.send exists and type of function
Check if readonly UDPSocket.localAddress exists and type of DOMString
Check if readonly UDPSocket.localPort exists and type of unsigned short
Check if readonly UDPSocket.remoteAddress exists and type of DOMString
Check if readonly UDPSocket.remotePort exists and type of unsigned short
Check if readonly UDPSocket.addressReuse exists and type of boolean
Check if readonly UDPSocket.loopback exists and type of boolean
Check if readonly UDPSocket.bufferedAmount exists and type of unsigned long
Check if readonly UDPSocket.readyState exists and type of enum
Check if UDPSocket.ondrain exists and type of event
Check if UDPSocket.onerror exists and type of event
Check if UDPSocket.onmessage exists and type of event
Check if UDPSocket.close exists and type of function
Check if UDPSocket.suspend exists and type of function
Check if UDPSocket.resume exists and type of function
Check if UDPSocket.joinMulticastGroup exists and type of function
Check if UDPSocket.leaveMulticastGroup exists and type of function
Check if UDPSocket.send exists and type of function
Check if the default value of UDPSocket.addressReuse is true
Check if the value of UDPSocket.bufferedAmount is the number of bytes which have previously been buffered by calls to the send methods of this socket
Check if UDPSocket.localAddress can be set by the constructors options arguments valid localAddress member
Check if UDPSocket throw a DOM exception invoked with the constructors options arguments invalid localAddress member
Check if UDPSocket.localAddress is not null when the remoteAddress member is present
Check if UDPSocket.localAddress is null without the localAddress and the remoteAddress members
Check if the default value of UDPSocket.loopback is false
Check if UDPSocket.remoteAddress can be set by the constructors options arguments valid remoteAddress member
Check if UDPSocket throw a DOM exception invoked with the constructors options arguments invalid remoteAddress member
Check if UDPSocket.remoteAddress is null when not stated by the options argument of the constructor
Check if UDPSocket.remotePort can be set by the constructors options arguments valid remotePort member
Check if UDPSocket throw a DOM exception invoked with the constructors options arguments invalid remotePort member
Check if UDPSocket.remotePort is null when not stated by the options argument of the constructor
Check if set up the ondrain event successful for UDPSocket using the type drain
Check if set up the onerror event successful for UDPSocket using the type error
Check if set up the onmessage event successful for UDPSocket using the type message
Check if set up the onopen event successful for UDPSocket using the type open
Check if ondrain event can be fired upon detection that previously-buffered data has been written to the network and it is possible to buffer more data received from the application
Check if onerror event can be fired when there is an error
Check if onmessage event can be fired when every time a UDP datagram has been received and was read
Check if onopen event can be fired when the socket is open and ready to use to send and receive data
Check if the value of readyState is open when the socket is in open state
Check if the value of readyState is opening when the socket is in opening state
Check if the value of readyState is closed when the socket is in closed state
Check if the value of readyState is closed after calling close method
Check if socket.joinMulticast can add the given address to join the multicast group
Check if socket.leaveMulticast can leave the given address in the multicast group
Check if socket.suspend can pause reading incoming UDP data
Check if socket.resume can resume reading incoming UDP data
Check if socket.send can send data to the remoteAddress and remotePort
Check if the default value of TCPSocket.addressReuse is true
Check if the value of TCPSocket.addressReuse can be set by the options argument in the constructor
Check if TCPSocket.localAddress can be set by the constructors options argument s valid localAddress member
Check if TCPSocket.localPort can be set by the constructors options arguments valid localPort member
Check if the default value of TCPSocket.noDelay is true
Check if TCPSocket.noDelay can be set to false
Check if TCPSocket throw a DOM exception invoked with the constructors options arguments invalid localAddress member
Check if TCPSocket throw a DOM exception invoked with the constructors options arguments invalid remoteAddress member
Check if set up the onclose event successful for TCPSocket using the type close
Check if set up the ondrain event successful for TCPSocket using the type drain
Check if set up the onerror event successful for TCPSocket using the type error
Check if set up the onopen event successful for TCPSocket using the type open
Check if onclose event can be fired when the connection to the server has been closed
Check if bind the socket to an ephemeral local port decided by the system and set the localPort attribute to this port when localPort is absent
Check if use the routing table to determine the local interface(s) that can be used to connect to the selected remoteAddress when localAddress is absent
Check if ondrain event can be fired upon detection that previously-buffered data has been written to the network and it is possible to buffer more data received from the application
Check if onerror event can be fired when there is an error
Check if onopen event when the socket is open and the connection to the server has been established
Check if the value of readyState is opening when the socket is in opening state
Check if the value of readyState is open when the socket is in open state
Check if the value of readyState is closing when the socket is in closing state
Check if the value of readyState is halfclosed when the socket is in halfclosed state
Check if the value of readyState is closed when the socket is in closed state
Check if pause reading incoming TCP data and invocations of the ondata handler until resume is called.
Check if the value of readyState is closed after calling close method
Check if can not send data but can receive data after calling halfclose method
Check if resume reading incoming TCP data and invoking ondata as usual after calling resume method
Check if can send DOMString using send method
Check if can send Blob object using send method
Check if can send ArrayBufferView using send method
Check if can send ArrayBuffer using send method
Check if the value of TCPSocket.bufferedAmount is zero without sending anything when connectted
Check if the value of TCPSocket.bufferedAmount is the number of bytes which have previously been buffered by calls to the send methods of this socket with Blob
Check if the value of TCPSocket.bufferedAmount is the number of bytes which have previously been buffered by calls to the send methods of this socket with ArrayBufferView
Check if the value of TCPSocket.bufferedAmount is the number of bytes which have previously been buffered by calls to the send methods of this socket with ArrayBuffer
Check if the default value of TCPServerSocket.addressReuse is true
Check if the value of TCPServerSocket.addressReuse can be set by the options argument in the constructor
Check if TCPServerSocket.localAddress can be set by the constructors options arguments valid localAddress member
Check if TCPServerSocket.localPort can be set by the constructors options arguments valid localPort member
Check if set up the onconnect event successful for TCPServerSocket using the type connect
Check if set up the onconnecterror event successful for TCPServerSocket using the type connecterror
Check if set up the onerror event successful for TCPServerSocket using the type error
Check if set up the onopen event successful for TCPServerSocket using the type open
Check if onconnect event can be fired when an incoming connection attempt on the specified port and address has been accepted
Check if onconnecterror event can be fired when there is an error on an incoming connection attempt
Check if onerror event can be fired when there is an error on the server socket
Check if onopen event can be fired when the socket is open and ready to receive connection attempts from clients
Check if the value of readyState is open when the socket is in open state
Check if the value of readyState is opening when the socket is in opening state
Check if the value of readyState is closed when the socket is in closed state
Check if close the TCP server socket after calling close method
Check if pause listening for incoming connections and invocations after calling suspend method
Check if resume listening for incoming connections and invocations after calling resume method
